snippet.title: Fabular: Once Upon a Spacetime - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Battle, loot and upgrade your way through the galaxy in this indie action-RPG-roguelike. Play the demo now and wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/645720/

Join on Discord: https://discord.gg/xR4Gwf7

http://fabulargame.com/
https://twitter.com/fabulargame
